message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the automatic classification of scientific articles based on common characteristics, which is a problem commonly addressed in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of topic extraction and bundling is also a common technique in deep learning (cs.DL) and machine learning (cs.LG) for text classification. Additionally, the paper mentions the application of these techniques in digital libraries (cs.DL) and information retrieval systems (cs.IR), and the use of semantic indexing (cs.SI) to improve classification accuracy.
